Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute at Stony Island/71st
ShortDescription: 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via: Stony Island, 73rd, Dorchester, 70th, Stony Island, due to, street blockage, near Stony Island/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Stony Island, 73rd, Dorchester, 70th, and Stony Island, due to, street blockage, near Stony Island/71st.

Allow extra travel time.
